About

I am a geophysics doctoral candidate at Columbia University's Climate School and part of the Austermann lab group at Lamont Doherty Earth Observatory. My research focuses on sea-level change in the past and future and the effect that sea level has on permafrost and sedimentary processes.

Before Columbia:
→ Company Dancer & Choreographer @ The Louisville Ballet
→ BA in Geology & English @ Amherst College




News

March 2022: Our paper on "Postglacial Relative Sea Level in Norway" was just published in Quaternary Science Reviews!
